CustomField.description: Total de custos atribuídos ao cliente conforme estudo de viabilidade vinculado.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(MainViability__c), 0, IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Ramal CC'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.DcBranchCost__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Ramal CA'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.AcBranchCost__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Adequação Padrão'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.StandardAdequacyCost__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Cobertura'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.CoberturaCost__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Laudo Estrutural'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.StruturalReport__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Outros Custos'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.OtherCosts__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Custos Adicionais'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.AdditionalCost__c, 0), 0) + IF(INCLUDES(MainViability__r.AdequacyCostEnerzee__c, 'Visita Técnica'), BLANKVALUE(MainViability__r.TechnicalVisitCost__c, 0), 0) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total de custos atribuídos ao cliente conforme estudo de viabilidade vinculado.
CustomField.label: Custo Total da Enerzee
